title: ANF seizes 74 kg drugs in 11 operations
content:
RAWALPINDI, Jul 29 (APP): Anti-Narcotics Force (ANF) while conducting 11 operations across the country managed to recover 74 kg drugs and arrested 10 accused, said an ANF Headquarters spokesman here on Monday.
He informed that 3 kg ice was recovered from a Jeddah-bound passenger at Islamabad Airport.
24 kg hashish was recovered from an accused arrested near Iqbal Shaheed Toll Plaza Attock.
In third operation, 12 kg hashish was recovered from an accused rounded up near Jannat Gul Town, Karachi.
9.6 kg hashish was recovered from a drug smuggler arrested in Khanewal. 6 kg opium and 2 kg hashish were recovered from the possession of a woman netted at M-1, Islamabad.
4.8 kg hashish was recovered from a vehicle intercepted on River Road Karachi and an accused was arrested during the operation.
4.8 kg hashish was recovered from two suspects arrested near Sangjani Toll Plaza, Islamabad.
2.4 kg hashish and 450 grams ice were recovered near Link Road, Karachi and 3 kg ice was recovered from an accused rounded up near Pushtakhara Chowk, Peshawar.
In 10th operation, 2 kg hashish was recovered from the accused near Ayub National Park Rawalpindi and in 11th operation, 800 grams ice was recovered near University Road Peshawar.
Cases under the Anti-Narcotics Act have been registered against the arrested accused and further investigations are under process.
